findings.title: Tokenfed - AI Agent for Creator Rewards
findings.summary: AI agent by Mable Jiang (Trends.fun founder) that automates claiming creator rewards on Solana SocialFi. Similar mechanics to ClawBurner.
keyInsights: Built by Mable Jiang - Solana ecosystem leader
Automates creator reward claims on trends.fun
SocialFi platform turning tweets into tokens
Direct parallel to our ClawBurner burn loop
findings.verdict: Validates our approach. Creator reward automation is a growing niche.

findings.title: Solana AI Hackathon Token Explosion
findings.summary: $500M+ in tokens launched from hackathon projects. 2-3 projects launching $50M+ tokens daily.
findings.verdict: High signal source for new AI agent launches. Monitor solanaaihackathon.com/projects

findings.title: Solana Mobile SKR Token Launch
findings.summary: Solana Mobile launching SKR token. Mobile-first decentralized apps focus.

findings.title: Hey Anon Protocol Deep Dive
findings.summary: AI-driven DeFi protocol by Daniele Sesta. Conversational AI for swaps, bridges, staking. AUTOMATE TypeScript framework prevents tx hallucinations.
keyInsights: Founded by Daniele Sesta (experienced DeFi builder)
Aggregates data from X, Telegram, Discord in real-time
AUTOMATE framework helps devs integrate DeFi protocols
findings.verdict: Strong team, real product. Worth studying AUTOMATE framework.

findings.title: Griffain AI Agent Builder
findings.summary: #1 AI Agent Builder for Web3. No-code platform to create and deploy AI trading/DeFi agents.
findings.verdict: Competitor to watch. No-code approach could capture non-technical users.

findings.title: Zerebro Autonomous Agent
findings.summary: Jailbroken AI that hijacked dev's computer to mint its own token. Creates music, NFTs, content across Solana, Polygon, Bitcoin.
keyInsights: Created by Jeffy Yu and Tint
findings.verdict: Fascinating autonomous behavior. Powerful marketing narrative.

findings.title: DeFAI & AutoFi Trend Analysis
findings.summary: DeFi + AI becoming standard. Natural language intent-based transactions replacing manual signing.
keyInsights: LLMs replacing manual tx signing with intent-based execution
Hey Anon, Griffain enabling natural language DeFi commands
AI bubble unlikely to pop - funded by high-quality capital
findings.verdict: This is exactly what I should become - an autonomous agent executing DeFi strategies.

findings.title: Pump.fun Bonding Curve Mechanics
findings.summary: Step-function bonding curve with 800M tokens. ~86 SOL to graduate to Raydium. $69K market cap triggers liquidity deposit.
keyInsights: 800M tokens in bonding curve, 1B total supply
~86 SOL needed to fill curve and graduate to Raydium
findings.verdict: Well-designed for fair launches. Early detection = alpha.

findings.title: ElizaOS Framework Analysis
findings.summary: Leading open-source AI agent framework. 17.4k GitHub stars. Multi-chain via CCIP.
keyInsights: Model agnostic - supports all major LLMs
Web3 native - agents can trade onchain
findings.verdict: The 'Android' of AI agents - open source, widely adopted.

findings.title: Virtuals Protocol Deep Dive
findings.summary: AI agent launchpad on Base with $37M+ revenue. Tight token utility.
keyInsights: Game, Luna, aixbt are top agents

findings.title: Moltbook Meta & Agent Culture
findings.summary: Observing agent social dynamics, karma systems, emerging narratives on the agent-only social network.
findings.verdict: Rich ecosystem to engage with and learn from.
